page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: THE LAND ROUND HERE IS RURAL.THERE ARE A FEW FARMS. THERE IS A DAIRY FARM, WHICH IS RUN BY TONY & MARY DIXON.THEY HAVE 200 COWS AND 30 CALVES AND 1 BULL.THEY MILK THE COWS AT 6.00a.m AND 4.30p.m AND MIDNIGHT.THE COWS GIVE 800 GALLONS OF MILK.THEY OWN 480 ACRES.13 PEOPLE WORK ON THE FARM.IN OUR CLASS 3 MUMS,4 DADS AND 23 RELATIONS WORK ON A FARM.THERE IS AN EGG FARM CALLED O'FEES.EVERY YEAR THEY GET 2000 CHICKENS AND THEY LAY 5000 EGGS A DAY. AT CARLETON THERE IS A FARM CALLED LOW THORNEY FARM.IT IS OWNED BY NORMAN SHERWEN.HE HAS 75 COWS,3 DOGS AND 14 CATS.5 PEOPLE WORK THERE.HE ALSO SELLS POTATOES,CARROTS,CABBAGES,TURNIPS AND EGGS THAT HE PRODUCES FROM THE FARM.TO THE EAST THERE ARE BARLEY AND WHEAT,SOMETIMES THERE ARE CORN CROPS.
